item.description:
https://www.facebook.com/events/461661507190187/

This is a less formal shoot open to all. Bring your own concept to shoot. Our facility will allow almost any kind of shoot you can think of.

Come meet models and photographers to work with now and in the future. Post your ideas here and find someone, or a group, to work on your idea.

This will be $40 for photographers. Hair, MUA, models and designers are free and encouraged to come show off!

Please pay ahead to attend. Paypal (payment@worcesterphotostudios.com) is the preferred method. Reference the shoot in the comments.

What to bring:
Photographers should bring their own lights. Models should bring anything they need to make their concept happen. Models and Photographers are encouraged to bring their own releases as well as business cards.There will be space for indoor and outdoor shooting. Props are encouraged.
Mua's should bring their gear and business cards. Make sure you get info from everyone you work with so we can get credit for your work.


Code of conduct:

If you are attending one of our events, please take a moment to review this.

Alcohol and drugs are strictly prohibited at all times.

This is an pg13 event. Parent or guardian required for anyone under 18.

Inappropriate behavior will result in a verbal warning by a WPS staff member. If such behavior continues, you will be asked to leave.

These rules are put in place for everyone's safety and comfort. Any questions about Code Of Conduct or studio rules can be directed to info@worcesterphotostudios.com
item.name: Concept Shoot
